GSD.description:
ice: set tx_tstamps when creating new Tx rings via ethtool

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 624f03a027f2b18647cc4f1a7a81920a1e4e0201. For more details please see the references link.
